summary: Identified three root causes: (1) Watchdog error from missing /etc/localtime on NixOS - requires TZ environment variable at system level; (2) leanls exit code 1 caused by the timezone issue affecting lake; (3) Invalid buffer id error in infoview.lua:964 when buffer is deleted while infoview is open - needs buffer validity check

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive research report with root cause analysis for leanls LSP errors, NixOS timezone configuration, and lean.nvim infoview buffer handling issues
